    • Constructor Detail

      • WindowPattern

        public WindowPattern(Space[][] spaces,
                     int difficulty,
                     java.lang.String name)
              throws WindowPatternDimensionException,
                     UnboundDifficultyValueException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        spaces - matrix of spaces.
        difficulty - the difficulty of the pattern.
        name - the window pattern name.
        Throws:
        WindowPatternDimensionException - if the dimension is wrong
        UnboundDifficultyValueException - if the difficulty value is wrong

        getter of the space at a certain point.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the corresponding space on the window pattern

      • getSpace

        public Space getSpace(int x,
                      int y)
               throws NotValidPointException
        getter of the space at a certain point.
        Parameters:
        x - row coordinate
        y - column coordinate
        Returns:
        the corresponding space on the window pattern
        Throws:
        NotValidPointException - will be thrown if the space doesn't exist

      • getAllSpaces

        public Space[][] getAllSpaces()
        getter of all the spaces.
        Returns:
        a matrix with all the spaces of the window pattern

      • isPlaceable

        public boolean isPlaceable(Die die,
                           Point p)
        checks if the die is placeable for the window pattern. If the window is empty, this method checks if the point is on the edge of the window, otherwise it will check if there is any adjacent die to the point p.
        Parameters:
        p - a point

      • isPlaceableIgnoreColor

        public boolean isPlaceableIgnoreColor(Die die,
                                      Point p)
        Checks if the die is placeable for the window pattern ignoring color restrictions. If the window is empty, this method checks if the point is on the edge of the window, otherwise it will check if there is any adjacent die to the point p. Ignoring color restrictions.
        Parameters:
        die - the die.
        p - a point.

      • isPlaceableIgnoreValue

        public boolean isPlaceableIgnoreValue(Die die,
                                      Point p)
        Checks if the die is placeable for the window pattern ignoring value restrictions. If the window is empty, this method checks if the point is on the edge of the window, otherwise it will check if there is any adjacent die to the point p. Ignoring value restrictions.
        Parameters:
        die - the die.
        p - a point.

      • isPlaceableNoAdjacent

        public boolean isPlaceableNoAdjacent(Die die,
                                     Point p)
        Checks if the die is placeable for the window pattern and there's no die in adjacent spaces. If the window is empty, this method checks if the point is on the edge of the window, otherwise it will check if there is any adjacent die to the point p.
        Parameters:
        die - the die.
        p - a point.

      • placeDie

        public void placeDie(Die die,
                     Point p)
              throws PlacementException
        places a die in a certain point in this window pattern
        Parameters:
        die - a die
        p - the point where you want to place the die
        Throws:
        PlacementException - it will be thrown if the die is not placeable

        Parameters:

        PlacementException

                                Point p)

        Parameters:
        die - a die
        p - the point where you want to place the die
        Throws:
        PlacementException - it will be thrown if the die is not placeable

                                int x,
                                int y)
                         throws NotValidPointException,
                                PlacementException
        Places a die on a space of the window ignoring the space's color restrictions
        Parameters:
        die - a die
        x - the row where you want to place the die
        y - the column where you want to place the die
        Throws:
        NotValidPointException - if the point is not valid
        PlacementException - if the die isn't placeable

      • placeDieIgnoreAdjacent

        public void placeDieIgnoreAdjacent(Die die,
                                   Point p)
                            throws PlacementException
        Place a die on a space of the window pattern. The spaces adjacent to the space where the die will be placed don't need to have a die.
        Parameters:
        die - the die that have to be placed.
        p - the coordinates of the space.
        Throws:
        PlacementException - if the die can not be placed.

      • moveDie

        public void moveDie(Point a,
                    Point b)
             throws NotValidMoveException
        Moves the die from a point to another.
        Parameters:
        a - the first point of the window
        b - the second point of the window
        Throws:
        NotValidMoveException - if the first point is empty or the second point has already a die

      • removeDie

        public Die removeDie(Point p)
              throws SpaceNotOccupiedException
        removes the die in point p
        Parameters:
        p - a point
        Throws:
        SpaceNotOccupiedException - if there isn't any die in the point p
